name: Magical Journey (itch) (KratosAI)
description: The game is a 2D platformer game in which you need to collect magical objects spread across the world while dodging enemies and find their way to the exit. You can use ladders to climb. Jump over enemies and spikes to dodge them. This is our first game jam ever and we are very excited to see the response. Made with love by Kratos and ConanVegeta. Hope you enjoy it!
